author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Earlier this week, we wrote about a UK cop who was being probed. He was sent to someone's house who had written the wrong opinion on social media, but laughed at how stupid it was to have to do so. You would think that would be the dumbest UK police story we would find this week. Instead, women are going undercover as joggers so that they can be catcalled... and arrest the catcallers.

No, really. This is what they are doing in some place outside of London called Surrey.

Mind you,
title: Female cops are going under cover as joggers to expose the criminal enterprise of... catcalling. No, for real. Catcalling.

author: Brodigan
description: Token conservative and fan favorite of this season of CNN Scott Jennings came over the top rope on the Leftist mouthpieces on News Night with Abby Phillips over the upcoming Trump/Putin meeting. Here’s a brief summary of President Donald Trump’s record on peacemaking and peace keeping. President Trump is going to make Washington, D.C. safe again and the Left is…mad about it? Because they think crime is down? Let’s throw a little factcheck out there, see what we get. Holes in the ozone layer, melting ice caps, acid rain. The climate change/global warming/the end is nigh doomsayers have said it all. And for their next trick: the Great Barrier Reef. In the words of Donald J. Trump: Wrong.
title: 🔴 Watch! Trump's Takeover Has the Left Absolutely Seething & It's Glorious (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

The internet is big on people clamoring for the good old days and claiming, "this is what they took from us." Not that remembering fondly when things were easier is anything new. Monetizing the nostalgia isn't even new. But there appear to be a lot of people lamenting online about it as of late, and the newest form is this creepy AI video claiming that 1985 Misses You.

I have no idea where this video came from. Once I find out, I will update the post and give proper credit.

Anyone know where the 1985 Misses You video originated from?
title: Viral "1985 Misses You" video is consuming the internet with nostalgia, but it's just creepy

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Donald Trump did a thing, causing Democrats and the media (but I repeat myself) to have a knee-jerk reaction to said thing that they didn't think through. Washington DC is a cesspool edition. Trump is against DC being a violent cesspool, so the media and Democrats (but I repeat myself) have to claim it isn't. As Scott Jennings points out during another 4-on-1 handicapped match, no one is buying it.

Ponder this quote from yesterday as you continue: "Donald Trump has some of the best political instincts of any politician.
title: Scott Jennings confronts hostile CNN panel that "nobody in their right mind" believes DC isn't a cesspool of crime
